class_notes: We will discuss "making babies" and the many aspects of assisted reproductive technology (ART) from both a scientific and ethical viewpoint.  Non-science majors are welcome, as any technical information will be explained.  You will be assigned a relatively short book (Pandora's Baby, by Robin Marantz Henig, 2006, ISBN 9780879698096) that is written for a general audience (please be finished with this book before we are two weeks into the semester) and there will be some additional readings and lecture (for background material), but the principal focus will be on presentations and discussions.  A short, written "summarize what you learned" paper will be due at the end of the semester.  Most of your grade will be determined by attendance, presentation, and your seminar participation.
